question: Netanyahu out by October 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Benjamin Netanyahu ceases to be Prime Minister of Israel for any length of time between May 19, 2024, and October 31, 2024, 11:59 PM Israel Standard Time. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Netanyahu ceases to be Prime Minister of Israel for any length of time within this market's timeframe, this market will immediately resolve to "Yes". This market will not resolve to "No" until its timeframe expires and Netanyahu has remained Prime Minister of Israel for the entire duration without interruption.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the government of the State of Israel, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Santhosh be the biggest winner on Day 4?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Santhosh is the player with the highest net winnings on Day 4 of the Hustler Casino ‘Million Dollar Game’ scheduled for Friday, May 31, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

If Santhosh does not participate on Day 4 of the ‘Million Dollar Game,’ this market will resolve to "No." 

The net winnings will be determined based on the final ‘Cumulative Winnings’ tracker displayed at the end of the live-streamed event. Only hands played during the live-streamed game on Day 4 will count towards this market’s resolution.

In the event of a tie for the highest net winnings, this market will resolve in favor of the player whose listed first name comes first alphabetically.

The resolution source for this market will be the final ‘Cumulative Winnings’ tracker displayed at the end of the live stream. If the live stream becomes unavailable, this market will resolve according to official information from Hustler Casino Live.

events.title: Biggest Winner - Million Dollar Game Day 4

question: Will Trump say "mog" in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Donald Trump publicly mentions the word(s) "mog", "mogs", and/or "mogging" between May 27 and December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market.

A ‘mention’ includes the following:

-A verbal usage of the word(s) "mog", "mogs", and/or "mogging".
-Any written usage of the word(s) "mog", "mogs", and/or "mogging" published through Trump's social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization.

The resolution source for this market will be footage of Donald Trump taken within the mentioned timeframe, as well as official communications from Donald Trump.

question: Ethereum ETF begins trading by July 4?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if any spot Ethereum ETF begins trading on the NASDAQ, NYSE, or CBOE by the time of market close on July 3, 2024 (Trading is closed on July 4, a holiday). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from relevant exchanges, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Ethereum ETF begins trading by July 4?

question: Was Iggy Azalea hacked?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if definitive evidence is released that Iggy Azalea’s X account @IGGYAZALEA https://x.com/IGGYAZALEA, was hacked, meaning that the recent tweet(s) about $MOTHER were posted without her consent or authorization. This market will resolve to "No" otherwise. If no definitive evidence is released prior to Wednesday, May 29, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No."

This market will resolve according to official statements from Iggy Azalea or a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Celeb charged with pumping memecoin before July?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if any Federal or State jurisdiction of the United States formally charges or otherwise announces a criminal indictment of a celebrity related to activities of launching, pumping, or dumping a memecoin between May 28 and June 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

For the purposes of this market, a celebrity is broadly defined as someone who does not work in the crypto industry, who is famous for an unrelated discipline such as music, sports, etc.

For the purposes of this market the District of Columbia and any county, municipality, or other subdivision of a State shall be included within the definition of a State.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from US governmental sources, however a wide consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Celeb charged with pumping memecoin before July?

question: Will Stanley Tang lose all his chips? - Million Dollar Game Day 4
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Stanley Tang loses all his chips during Day 4 of the Hustler Casino ‘Million Dollar Game’ scheduled for Friday, May 31, 2024, and is forced to rebuy or leave the table. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No". 

Only events occurring during the live-streamed event on Day 4 will be considered for this market's resolution.

The resolution source will be the official broadcast of the Hustler Casino Live stream. If the live stream becomes unavailable, the market will resolve based on official information from Hustler Casino Live.

Note: This market is on if Tang is felted, not if he loses his initial buy-in.

events.title: Will Stanley Tang lose all his chips? - Million Dollar Game Day 4

question: UFC 302: Kevin Holland vs. Michael Oleksiejczuk
description:
This is a market group about UFC 302, an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that is scheduled to take place on June 1, 2024, at the Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey.

This is a market on whether Kevin Holland or Michael Oleksiejczuk will win their bout.

If Kevin Holland is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Holland”. If Michael Oleksiejczuk is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Oleksiejczuk”.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after June 15, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Ansem criminal charges in 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Ansem (@blknoiz06) is officially charged with a criminal offense by any legal entity between May 28, 2024 and December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No."

The charges must be confirmed by reliable news sources or an official statement from a recognized legal authority such as a court of law, prosecutor's office, or police department.

This market will resolve to "No" if no such charges are placed by the resolution date.

question: Will Trump mention $MAGA before Election?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Donald Trump publicly mentions a  MAGA cryptocurrency (e.g. $MAGA, https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/maga-hat) by November 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

A ‘mention’ includes the following:

-A verbal usage of the word ‘MAGA’ specifically in reference to a cryptocurrency.
-Any written usage of the word ‘MAGA' published through Trump's social media or other official communication channels regardless of capitalization so long as it makes SPECIFIC REFERENCE to a $MAGA cryptocurrency.

This market will resolve to "Yes" so long as Trump references any '$MAGA' crypto token.

The resolution source for this market is a consensus of credible reporting.
